channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- HPE Integrated Lights-Out 3 (iLO 3)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- HPE Integrated Lights-Out 3 (iLO 3)

item.title: CVE-2017-8987|2024-08-05T16:55:21.295Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20integrated%20lights-out%203%20%28ilo%203%29
item.description: A Unauthenticated Remote Denial of Service vulnerability was identified in HPE Integrated Lights-Out 3 (iLO 3) version v1.88 only. The vulnerability is resolved in iLO3 v1.89 or subsequent versions.
